extendedInfo.description: Simple memory cleaner.This is different from task killer, frees up memory space using the feature that system kills running apps by low memory killer when available memory is low. This will improve the ease of use.Clean Feature:* Allocates very large memory during cleaning, and releases allocated memory.* The system will kill most of running apps and services at a time. So the memory fragmentation can expect to improve.* The services(widgets) is automatically started again by the system.* The resident apps and Home app to back immediately after startup with less memory usage.The timing of use:* when you feel that system is slower.* after use for a long time.* after you have used the resident apps which is not killed the task killer.How to use:1. Press the clean button and begin cleaning immediately.2. After cleaning, kill unused services by task killer if using or kill it from process list (Android 2.1 and below).Requirements:* Android 1.6 or higherOperation check:* Emulator(Android 1.6/2.x/3.x/4.0/4.1)* HTC Magic, Xperia X10, REGZA Phone T-01C, Galaxy S2 LTE, Galaxy NexusPermission:* NOT require Storage(WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE) permission  This app doesn't modify/delete SD card contents.

reviews.title: Omg
reviews.comment: I am suprised! This works perfect :D first i had 250mb ram free with the stock task killer, with this one 450! 100 stars for you! Top develloper and no ads
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Didnt meet my expectation
reviews.comment: Well, first run my phone froze and needed to take out battery, second run finished, killed itself, every other run i need to use button End to finish. My primary need was to install updates, due to low space i cannot, this app is not solution to my problem. Otherwise yes, slightly decreased the used memory, about additional 10%, which i appreciate
reviews.author: Petr Ho\305\231\303\241k

reviews.title: Highly recommended coz it works
reviews.comment: Ive tried quite a bunch of task/memory cleaning app, but only this one managed to freed up more memory, and reported correctly.  Keep it up. and keep this updated, slim and working.
reviews.author: Gerald Ong

reviews.title: Not perfect
reviews.comment: This kills some processes I need that does not automatically restart - meaning I have to restart the phone. Mainly \'Juice Defender\' and others. This app needs an option integrated to allow the user to tell the app to ignore some running processes. Please could this be looked into?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: BEST APP Memory Cleaner
reviews.comment: This is BEST APP Memory Cleaner I\'ve had  I already install more than 10 app with diff result, but with this app, i\'ve got more 223 mb ram free !! Excellent job.   but I think you miss one thing, the whitelist app. Thank you, I give you 100.000 STAR if i can.
reviews.author: Om Hayi

reviews.title: Still the best after all this time.
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried so many ram cleaners and this one has been the most aggressive out of all of them including the paid apps. There are some options in the settings for clean level & how to view the process list. I do wish I could white list some of the apps like you can with task killers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works good on my Note 2
reviews.comment: This is the 2nd phone I\'ve used FMR on. I had problems on my One S where it would continue to show it was cleaning and I would have to manually exit the app. But it would still free up a lot of memory.  Now on my Note 2, It works flawlessly. 1200+mb free menory is awesome.
reviews.author: Joe Whitaker

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Seem To Work On Nexus 4
reviews.comment: I have used this on 2 other Android phones and thought it was great. On the Nexus 4 it just spins and says cleaning.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good to check
reviews.comment: It\'s a good app for a memory \"checker\" but I don\'t recommend it as a memory cleaner, because it also cleans some system memories which shouldn\'t be cleaned. Therefore, I use \"app management\" to clean the memory.
reviews.author: Ryu Mura

reviews.title: Better than others!
reviews.comment: This app really works. Tried others but none closer to this. Light on memory and works fast!
reviews.author: ED LINESES

reviews.title: Does have ads!
reviews.comment: Yes, there are ads, but people need to eat an it is free.  Pretty much does a warm boot on my device, still a fast effective way to bring responsiveness back.
reviews.author: Chris Nalnoc

reviews.title: Fmr memory cleaner
reviews.comment: Unfortunately this removes AVAST Anti Virus. There needs to be a way to designate programs to not be removed. It leaves programs running that I don\'t care about and shuts off programs that I want to keep running. If this was added to this program, I would give it 5 stars.
reviews.author: Ronald Geiken

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: But it doesn\'t close after use. I mean, it just keeps cleaning but it doesn\'t stop unless I press the home button to exit. A bug?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome n totally working.!!
reviews.comment: M a heavy user...so ram of my fon was always a issue for me..hav to maintain lots of balance for it..after tryin all other Task Killers n memory boosters..this is the best app yet..totally true for its work..hats off to developers..<3
reviews.author: Arpit Mongia

reviews.title: Freezing on S4
reviews.comment: I have just upgraded to the Samsung Galaxy S4 and this app appears to start cleaning but looks to freeze as it doesn\'t complete cleaning and I have to exit using my phone\'s menu key. Can this be fixed? Worked perfectly on my S2.Sent from Samsung Mobile 5* once this is fixed.
reviews.author: Amanda MacDonald

reviews.title: One word-Awsum!!!
reviews.comment: I really like it...much better than other memory cleaners
reviews.author: Niyas Rahman

reviews.title: Supervisor
reviews.comment: Just love this soft, it refresh my whole system..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best cleaner
reviews.comment: This is genuine cleaner.. Now my phone is very fast ...
reviews.author: vignesh karthick

reviews.title: amazing
reviews.comment: work perfect and its the best. trust me you wont believe when you see your free ram :) after clean 555mb total 410mb free ram. thx dev!
reviews.author: Barney P

reviews.title: Doesnt work on Atrix 2 ICS
reviews.comment: This app worked perfectly on gingerbread but after OTA ICS update on ATT Moto Atrix 2 it says home \"screen stopped unexpectedly\" after each use and takes a phone reboot to correctly restore home screen functions. Very annoying!
reviews.author: Brian Berger
